Synopsis:
Thomas Loud is back! Join him and Len Hewitt as they travel through Uganda in search of an ex-child soldier with a special set of DNA. In this action thriller, you'll experience adrenaline filled day of Thomas Loud, gene collector extraordinaire.

A note from the author:
Dear The Pirate Bay community, I hope you'll like reading about Thomas Loud's adventures. He was a man like any other. Like us. Angry, disenchanted with the world around him. He tried to make a stand and it nearly got him thrown in jail for the rest of his life - now he is doing things differently, saving the world a gene at a time...
